definition: to stop/to pause/to arrange/to lay out/to kowtow/to stamp (one's foot)/at once/classifier for meals, beatings, scoldings etc: time, bout, spell, meal

sentences.english: It is either very good or very bad with Bolton.
sentences.chinese: 目前的博尔顿队既说不上太好也说不上太坏。

sentences.english: Against Liverpool in the Premier League at home Bolton have won two, drawn two and lost four.
sentences.chinese: 迎战利物浦之前，博尔顿的战绩是两胜两平四负。

sentences.english: I went on trial to Bolton when I was 10.
sentences.chinese: 我10岁就去参加了在博尔顿的训练。

sentences.english: In defence, John Terry's valiant display kept Bolton out.
sentences.chinese: 特里严密的防守让博尔顿哑然失色。

sentences.english: Bolton defend deep in the second-half and Chelsea run out of ideas.
sentences.chinese: 博尔顿在下半场严密防守，而切尔西亦无板斧破解。

sentences.english: Roy Hodgson hopes Joe Cole can kickstart his Liverpool career following his injury-time winner against Bolton on Saturday.
sentences.chinese: 霍二希望小乔可以在周六打赢博尔顿之后能够爆发。

sentences.english: Sotirios Kyrgiakos made his Liverpool debut at Bolton back in August.
sentences.chinese: 基里亚科斯八月面对博尔顿上演他的利物浦处子秀。

sentences.english: A few years later, Boulton applied steam power to minting coins.
sentences.chinese: 几年以后，博尔顿将蒸汽动力应用到了硬币铸造。

sentences.english: Daniel Sturridge was loaned to Bolton this season.
sentences.chinese: 斯图里奇是切尔西租借给博尔顿的。

sentences.english: Bolton are interested in bringing Barcelona youngster Thiago Alcantara in on a season-long loan.
sentences.chinese: 博尔顿很希望通过一年的租借引进蒂亚戈。

sentences.english: Once we got the first goal against Bolton the result was never in doubt.
sentences.chinese: 一旦我们在博尔顿首开纪录，胜利是毫无疑问的。

sentences.english: Denilson is back in the squad and he will be available for Bolton.
sentences.chinese: 德尼尔森回到了球队，他将可以在博尔顿比赛上场。

sentences.english: Merida is out because he has had an ankle injury since the first Bolton game.
sentences.chinese: 梅里达缺席，因为他在第一场博尔顿比赛中脚踝受伤。

definition: Bradford, city in West Yorkshire, England
Aberdeen (city on east coast of Scotland)
Everton (town in northwest England)/Everton soccer team

pinyin: Men2 xing1 ge2 la1 de2 ba1 he4

definition: Dortmund, city in the Ruhr 魯爾區|鲁尔区[Lu3 er3 Qu1], Germany
